text: The year 2015 was the 6th year in the history of the Road Fighting Championship, an MMA promotion based in South Korea. 2015 started with Road FC 021: Champions day and ended with Road FC 027: In China. == List of events == {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font- size:80%;" !
